phrases: Well, it is the end of December.
If we go like THIS, it does not feel so cold, right?
Yet this, indeed, is what makes a Japanese winter!
Note: They are standing back-to-back like this as a sort of children's game where a song is sang.
In snuggling, we become as warm as steamed buns!
Note: They are standing back-to-back like this as a sort of children's game where a song is sang.
Oshikura-manju, osarete naku na You cramped steamed buns, do not cry when you are pushed!
What do you think you are doing?!
Oshikura-manju, osarete naku na You cramped steamed buns, do not cry when you are pushed!
Oshikura-manju, osarete naku na You cramped steamed buns, do not cry when you are pushed!
Oshikura-manju, osarete naku na You cramped steamed buns, do not cry when you are pushed!
Oshikura-manju, osarete naku na You cramped steamed buns, do not cry when you are pushed!
Now then, give it all you have got, Kirie!
Oshikura-manju, osarete naku na You cramped steamed buns, do not cry when you are pushed!
Oshikura-manju, osarete naku na You cramped steamed buns, do not cry when you are pushed!
Oshikura-manju, osarete naku na You cramped steamed buns, do not cry when you are pushed!
Oshikura-manju, osarete naku na You cramped steamed buns, do not cry when you are pushed!
Usually, I feel a little sad at the end of the year, but, strangely...
Oshikura-manju, osarete naku na You cramped steamed buns, do not cry when you are pushed!
Right now, I do not feel sad at all!
Oshikura-manju, osarete naku na You cramped steamed buns, do not cry when you are pushed!
Oshikura-manju, osarete naku na You cramped steamed buns, do not cry when you are pushed!
Umaru, what do you want for dinner tonight?
I can have anything at all?
I did not say anything, but still...
Step 1 will be a brick oven.
What makes you think we have to start by making a brick oven?
We can just have it delivered.
Why do you always take the easy way out?
Making things by hand gives it a taste all its own.
But delivery pizza was handmade by the people at the store, right?
If I can get some delicious stuff without having to make it myself, that is fine by me!
So that is your thought process, huh?
Listen up, Umaru: Tonight, your way of thinking will be turned on its head!
What is got him so much more fired up than usual...?
Sure enough, he is fired up.
I took Taihei up on his offer to come by, Sensei.
This will be my first time to eat something made at home.
Note: A dish of fried batter with cabbage and various meats.
Wait, that is not pizza at all!
Okonomiyaki is a Japanese-style pizza, right?
Jeez, I was REALLY in the mood for pizza tonight!
Hey, what should we use for our first ingredient?
Hey, what should we use for our first ingredient?
Well, I say we go with shrimp or squid, or a seafood mix.
Taihei, let us hear what you think.
We have got to start off with meat, right?
No, it must be seafood, right?
Would not it be best to start off with something light?
Note: A pungent dish of fermented soybeans.
It will go great with scallions.
A man's got to start with meat, dude.
I do not care for natto myself...
Then let us go with meat!
a MIX is the only way to go!
Pork belly and beef tendon and cheese!
You want to put MORE in?!
Hold on: this goes way beyond your regular mix!
Well, I guess it is time to flip it.
Umaru, you want to do it?
It is a revenge match from that time we did pancakes!
You have to get it in the air and flip it over.
Tanukichi, you going to be okay?
You KNOW this will be delicious!
Sh-she is melting right in front of us!
Well, I will be making a lot more, so Bomba and Alex, have as much as you like.
It is good to make things yourself, right?
C'mon, get this as a Christmas present for me.
Why is this game so expensive?
It is a limited edition, with the same design as the game it comes bundled with.
You want this even though you already have the game?
Well, it is Christmas and all...
It totally looks like he will buy it for me!
You are going to work on a Sunday?
The end of the year is always busy.
I will buy something on the way back.
Till then, clean things up around here.
Ebina will be coming over, right?
Umaru, I am really looking forward to tonight.
Um, no, I mean we will all eat cake together.
My family actually said we should all get together this year!
And my mother made a reservation at a restaurant.
It would have been even more fun if Kirie and Sylphin could have made it, huh?
Still, my brother will be happy that you have come.
He said that making food for a Christmas party makes it extra special.
I have not given Taihei a present since his birthday.
There is so much I cannot thank him enough for...
You got my brother a present?!
And there is one for you as well.
What will YOU be giving your brother?
I thought maybe you and I could buy him a present together.
Oh, well, if you do not mind.
I tried thinking of what to give him, but it was so hard...
What did you get for him?
I am sure he will like that!
Hmm, but what should I get him?
It did not occur to me to get HIM a present.
That will be my present to you, Ebina.
I have always thought a cap would really suit you.
So, I guess it is my turn.
I have always thought a cap would really suit you.
So it is a cap exchange party?
I never thought giving and receiving presents could be this much fun.
I wonder what sort of present would make Big Brother happy.
I thought you would be waiting at the house.
The both of us ambushed you!
I bought you a present, Big Brother!
It is a brand-new frying pan!
Well, let us all go buy things for tonight's dinner.
But before that, what kind of present do you think you would like, Ebina?
Just do not forget about mine, Big Brother!
My younger sister Hikari is a little strange.
First off, she is a slob.
She loves bread, and is always snacking...
And for some reason, she likes spinning around.
When did she start to get like that?
I feel like she is been hiding something from me recently.
I guess it is our home environment.
Maybe it is all my fault...
When will that Big Brother from before be coming back?
I want to see Big Brother again.
L-look, it was a coincidence he came here in the first place.
But you both go to the same school, do not you?
She is being really pushy today!
He is at the top of his class?
I am taking AP classes while he is in the regular curriculum.
It was the award ceremony that led us to becoming friends.
And he gave me so many compliments, saying how well I would done!
Would Big Brother praise me if I got an award too?
I think Taihei got the same sense of destiny!
You were picked as the top student, and got an award?
You are my little sister all right!
You have done so well, Hikari!
With this award, he will praise me.
I am going to get you the greatest Christmas present of all!
You are just inviting him over for Christmas for a little bit.
Say, you got any plans tonight?
It is Christmas Eve but you are free, right?
I am having dinner with my family.
You two go home and spend time with your families.
If I could not even ask him to go out to do something, there is no way I could ask him to my HOUSE!
I never learned how to invite people over in my AP classes!
Hikari, it will be Christmas in two days, so...
How about you and I have some cake and watch a movie?
Are you going to rent one again?
Last time, you went out to rent a movie when I was asleep and spent Christmas on your own.
Heartfelt wishes for a good year.
Thanks for inviting us over today.
It is the picture of the New Year!
I like the mood within Japan during the New Year indeed!
The stores are closed, and you can lounge about as much as you like!
Sylph, one must not lie on one's back while wearing a kimono.
I am sure you are all tired from ringing in the New Year.
More importantly, thank you so much for the kimonos.
This is no time to be lying about, everyone!
I have put together various New Years' items so we can all enjoy this day!
Note: Well-known board and card games, respectively.
You have got so many things.
You got all these not knowing what they are?
This paddle or what have you is pretty indeed!
I have never seen it before.
This is my first time too!
You do not see it too often, do you?
We had it back in my house.
I want to try it, indeed!
I am telling you, it is different.
It may look like tennis, but the rules are different.
You must not allow the shuttlecock to drop.
Those two sure do get along, do not they?
Indeed, now we should form our teams!
This is my first time to be on a team with you, Umaru!
Yeah, I guess you are right.
Let us hurry up and put an end to this.
We need only not drop the shuttlecock, yes?
A paddle is completely different from a tennis racket.
So then, how about we introduce a game of Penalty?
I cannot bring shame to Umaru's beautiful face!
But, I want to play this Penalty Game, indeed!
Let us do it as a one-on-challenge.
It is like an extra inning, yes?
Ebina, have a seat with me.
New Years' sure is great, huh?
Umaru, here is your New Years' allowance.
Up till now, I would have just gone and spent all this, but...
this year, you will find that I am a SMIDGE different.
I gave my greed the smackdown and decided to save it, Big Brother!
I exchanged it all for 500-yen coins, so it is made me feel kind of sorta rich!
You did not have to change all that for coins, did you?
Still, it is pretty grownup of you to save it all.
This way, it is hard to spend too much at once, right?
Yeah, that does make it a pain to get money.
I was just thinking, maybe you would like to add to the piggy...
But those are YOUR savings, right?
Wh-where could my money have gone?
I cannot think of a single reason!
There are way too many reasons!
But this time, I am not going to help her out.
It is for her own good.
I promised everyone we would all do something together.
Still, in this day and age, what can I do with only 500 yen?
Times have changed since you were young, you know.
Also, YOU may not have any hobbies,
but do not go thinking everyone is the same and they do not spend money!
So, how about a bit more for the piggy?
